description: This file defines the BirthdayRepository class, which provides an abstraction layer for accessing birthday data through Firebase REST API and Realtime API. It includes methods for listing, creating, updating, deleting, and subscribing to birthday data.

classes.name: BirthdayRepository
classes.description: A data access class that interacts with Firebase APIs to perform CRUD operations and subscriptions for birthday data.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Fetches a list of birthdays for a specific user via the REST API.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new birthday entry via the REST API.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing birthday entry via the REST API.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a birthday entry by ID via the REST API.

methods.name: subscribe
methods.description: Subscribes to real-time updates of birthday data via Firebase Realtime API.
